goal:
The purpose of the Foundation is:
A) Education of young people interested in working in the national administration and
foreign policy with special focus on diplomacy;
B) Promoting a positive image of Poland in Poland and abroad;
C) promoting knowledge of international relations;
D) Supporting international cooperation;


The Foundation realizes its goals by:
A) conducting systematic educational activities;
B) supporting and organizing courses, trainings, seminars, thematic workshops;
C) organizing lectures, seminars and conferences, collecting data and information;
D) initiating and supporting training programs for specialists in various fields: business, administration, local government;
E) initiate and support research programs to provide knowledge about social, economic and political phenomena in the fields of education, culture, the environment and health and social care;
F) initiating and supporting programs undertaken by institutions engaged in scientific, technical, educational and cultural activities
(Including physical culture and sport), environmental protection, charity, health and social care, and occupational and social rehabilitation of the disabled;
G) initiating and support of international contacts for the development of democracy, market, science, culture, arts and education, and exchange of information;
(H) Initiate and support activities aiming at promoting knowledge of market mechanisms, democratic institutions, civil rights, the promotion of civic attitudes and economic autonomy and initiative;
I) cooperation with local authorities, governments and non-governmental organizations within the scope of the Foundation's activities;
(J) organization and coordination of pilot research programs and the work of expert groups;
K) supporting social initiatives within the scopeof the Foundation's goals;
L) actions for the interests of marginalized groups;
M) organizing and funding research into the development and application of law;
N) cooperation with individuals, national and foreign institutions operating in the field covered by the Foundation;

In addition to the above initiatives, the Foundation works with other institutions, organizations and individuals to achieve common goals. This interaction can be organizational support, partial or complete financing of the project or assistance in fundraising.
interests: Borders and Security, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Energy, Enlargement, External Relations, Foreign affairs and security policy, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Institutional affairs, Regional Policy, Youth
